translations: n．不道德行为，道德败坏：违背道德规范的行为或行为模式。
· The novel explores the immoralities of the upper class.
这部小说探讨了上层阶级的道德败坏。

sentences.sentence: Youth and juveniles are the main part of immoralities on web.
sentences.translation: 青少年是互联网上不道德行为的重要主体。

sentences.sentence: Measures should be taken to reduce and even stop the immoralities of youth and juveniles on web.
sentences.translation: 应对症下药，采取措施减少并杜绝青少年网上不道德行为。
